name: Apoc-eclipse
effect: Fire, Air, Earth, Water: Flip the opposing engaged Creature's Battlegear face‐down, draw an Attack Card, discard an Attack Card, deal 5 damage and gain 5 Energy.
Unique

name: Arbeid
effect: 1MC: Target attack deals 5 damage. This ability can only be used once per turn.
Unique, Loyal
"Keep attacking. I'll let you know when it stops tickling."

name: Arborsmash
effect: Stat Check Courage 50: Your engaged Creature gains Earth.

name: Armament Adagio
effect: Swap any Battlegear equipped to two target Creatures controlled by the same player.
It's true that we can accomplish great feats alone, but together, we can accomplish miracles.

name: Atrapol
effect: When Atrapol wins a Power Challenge on an attack it plays, destroy target Battlegear equipped to the opposing engaged Creature.
Like most UnderWorlders, Atrapol fights best when he's already winning.

name: Blaze Barrage
effect: Fire, Air: Draw an Attack Card, then discard an Attack Card.

name: Blazvatan
effect: Air 5
Earth 5
Recklessness 25
Unique, Loyal
Conjuring is worthless without control.

name: Blind Fury
effect: If your engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal 5 damage.

name: Bylkian
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 10.
1MC: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by an additional 10.

name: Catacombs of the Conjurors
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts by 5.
Conjurors have "Recklessness 5."
Shunned by even the most tolerant of Mipedians, Conjurors continue to push the boundaries of Mugic.

name: Challor
effect: Equipped Creature may not be the target of abilities.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.

name: Clodor
effect: When Clodor wins a Wisdom Challenge on an attack it plays, it gains a Mugic counter.
Without the harness, Clodor's unstable spark would have exploded and destroyed Perim long ago.

name: Cyclone Slam
effect: If your engaged Creature is a Warbeast, deal 20 damage.

name: Dexterous Storm
effect: Stat Check Speed 50: Your engaged Creature gains Air.

name: Drimesse
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 10.
If Drimesse has no Mugic counters, sacrifice it.
"Stop this madness! Haven't you learned from your mistakes?!"

name: Echoes of Empty Hands
effect: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to target engaged Creature. That Creature gains 10 Energy.
"Even lifeless machines have a life force."

name: Elemental Oxidation
effect: Fire, Earth: Flip all Battlegear equipped to the opposing engaged Creature face-down.

name: Enlightened Tenacity
effect: Stat Check Courage 30: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Courage 50: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Courage 70: Deal 5 damage.

name: Enre-hep
effect: When a Creature you control is put into your discard pile from play, Enre‐hep gains a Mugic counter for each Mugic counter on that Creature.
1MC: Target Creature gains "Recklessness 5".
Unique, Loyal

name: Entropy Modulator
effect: Sacrifice Entropy Modulator: Target attack deals 15 damage.

name: Ere
effect: Range
Swift 4
Recklessness 10
Loyal
Born of sand and storm, Ere can traverse the Mipedim Desert in mere seconds.

name: Fear Fight
effect: Stat Fail Courage 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Fighters' Fanfare
effect: The next time an attack would deal damage to a Creature this turn, it deals damage to target engaged Creature instead.
Unique
The existence of Mugic is proof enough that nothing is impossible.

name: Fivarth
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 5.
Fivarth may not be the target of Mugic or abilities.
"Our so-called 'leaders' have failed us. Now we must control our own destiny!"

name: Force Strike
effect: Stat Check Power 30: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Power 50: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Power 70: Deal 5 damage.

name: Forest of Life, During Aichlyys
effect: Creatures do not have Invisibility and cannot gain it.
On those rare nights when the triad stars of Lup, Lec, and Teo shine above the forest, all secrets are brought to light.

name: Gnarlus
effect: Damage dealt to Gnarlus by Mugic is reduced to 0.
2MC: Damage dealt to target Creature by Mugic is reduced to 0.

name: Hammerdoom Chantcaller, Assimilated
effect: Hive: Fireproof 10
Attacks played by Hammerdoom Chantcaller deal an additional 5 damage to UnderWorld Creatures.
Unique, Loyal

name: Hampering Winds
effect: Stat Fail Speed 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Harnessed Rage
effect: If your engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal damage equal to its Recklessness value.

name: Heptadd's Crown
effect: Equipped Creature may play Mugic of any tribe.
When equipped Creature plays a Mugic or ability, Heptadd's Crown deals 10 damage to it.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
Unique

name: Heptagon Hail
effect: Each Creature controlled by an opponent gains a Mugic counter.

name: Hifdan
effect: When a Creature you control gains a Mugic counter, Hifdan gains "Range" and "Swift 2".
Though feared by many for looking like an UnderWorlder, Hifdan is as loyal to Maxxor as they come.

name: Hunter's Lure
effect: Sacrifice Hunter's Lure: Relocate both engaged Creatures to an open space on the Battleboard. (The Creature that wins combat stays in the new space.)

name: Hurlicane
effect: Air: Your engaged Creature loses Air.

name: Hydro Balls
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 50: Your engaged Creature gains Water.

name: Hymn of Teleportation
effect: Choose one:
• Move target Mirage Location in play to any place on the Battleboard.
• If the active Location is a Mirage, put it into play on any space on the Battleboard and reveal a new active Location.

name: Indigo Grove
effect: When Indigo Grove becomes the active Location, you may sacrifice a non‐Conjuror Creature you control. If you do, return a Conjuror in your discard pile to play in any open space. (That Creature comes into play with no Mugic counters.)

name: Iparu
effect: At the beginning of combat, Iparu gains or loses Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed so those values become equal to the opposing engaged Creature's Scanned Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed.
Unique, Loyal

name: Iparu Jungle
effect: When this becomes the active Location, flip a coin. If tails, shuffle Iparu Jungle into its owner's Location Deck.
Mirage: At the beginning of combat, each engaged Creature in this space gains or loses Energy so its Energy is equal to its Scanned Energy.

name: Kalt
effect: 1MC: Another target Creature gains an Elemental Type of your choice. If that Creature is an Elementalist, it also gains a Mugic counter. This ability can only be used once per turn.

name: Karraba
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature for each Mugic counter on Karraba. This ability can only be used once per turn. (Check the number of Mugic counters when this ability resolves.)

name: Kinnianne, Ambassador to the Mipedians
effect: If a Mugic, activated ability, or triggered ability would heal a Mipedian you control, it heals an additional 5 damage.
Kinnianne may play Mipedian Mugic.
Unique

name: Kolmo, Assimilated
effect: Invisibility: Surprise
While engaged with a Mipedian Royal, Kolmo has "Invisibility: Strike 20."
1MC: If Kolmo is not engaged, relocate it to an open space on the Battleboard.
Unique

name: Kopond
effect: 1MC: Deal 5 damage to target Creature for each Mugic counter on Kopond. This ability can only be used once per turn. (Check the number of Mugic counters when this ability resolves.)

name: Lanker
effect: Lanker loses 5 Energy: Choose Courage, Power, Wisdom, or Speed. Target Creature gains 15 in the chosen discipline.

name: Lightning Canister
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
When Lightning Canister is placed in your discard pile from play, deal 5 damage to target engaged Creature. This effect still trigger if Lightning Canister was face down.

name: Liquescent Swirl
effect: Water: Your engaged Creature loses Water.

name: Lobanne
effect: 1MC: For each Mugic counter on Lobanne, choose "Fireproof 10," "Airproof 10," "Earthproof 10" or "Waterproof 10." Target Creature gains the chosen abilities. This ability can only be used once per turn. (Check the number of Mugic counters when this ability resolves.)

name: Makrabon
effect: When Makrabon gains a Mugic counter, Infect target Uninfected Creature.
1MC: Activate or Deactivate Hive until end of turn. (Hive must be active to Deactivate it.)

name: Matagore
effect: If your engaged Creature is Mipedian, it gains Air.

name: Melke
effect: Invisibility: Strike 10
If a Mirage Location is in play, Melke has an additional "Invisibility: Strike 10."
Beware when crossing The Hunter's Perimeter. You may become the hunted.

name: Melody of Parasitic Mayhem
effect: Infect target Uninfected engaged Creature. If Hive is Active, Uninfect all Creatures controlled by an opponent and deal 5 damage to target engaged Creature for each Creature Uninfected this way instead.

name: Mind Strike
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 30: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Wisdom 50: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Wisdom 70: Deal 5 damage.

name: Mipedian Dew Farm
effect: Scouts have Water.
Engaged Creatures with Water have "1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature."
Under the sun, one drop is the difference between life and death.

name: Mipedim Lounge
effect: Mirage: When an Attack Card is played by a Creature in this space, its controller may flip a coin. If tails, that player sacrifices his engaged Creature. If heads, the attack deals an additional 10 damage, and that player may flip again.

name: Mipedim Mirage
effect: Creatures have "Swift 1."
Mirage: If an adjacent Creature can move into this space, it must do so.
No one believed what the Muges saw, except for Tiaane.

name: Na-inna
effect: 0MC: Remove a Mugic counter from target Creature. If you do, put a Mugic counter on another Creature controlled by the same player. This ability can only be used once per turn.

name: Olkiex
effect: When a Creature you control gains a Mugic counter, flip target face-up Battlegear face-down.
Though Bodal takes credit for the repairs, Olkiex loves working for such a "charismatic" boss.

name: OverWorld Embassy at Mipedim Oasis
effect: When this becomes the active Location, shuffle any Mirage Locations in play into their owners' Location Decks.
Mipedians have Water.
Its outward tranquility masks the tumult within.

name: Phelphor
effect: At the beginning of your turn, you may relocate target Creature to an open space on the Battleboard adjacent to that Creature.
Everyone wants to know what's behind the Doors, but none more than him.

name: Progressive Speed
effect: Stat Check Speed 30: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Speed 50: Deal 5 damage.
Stat Check Speed 70: Deal 5 damage.

name: Purifying Mud
effect: Earth, Water: Deal 5 damage, then gain 5 Energy.

name: Ranun
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 10.
1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
I will not rest until both Maxxor and Chaor pay for their treachery!

name: Rao'Pa Sahkk, The Ocean with No Water
effect: Air and Earth attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
When a Water attack is played, that attack's controller turns the top card of their Location Deck face-up. It becomes the active Location.
Mirage: At the end of combat, engaged Creatures in this space gain a Mugic counter.

name: Ravita Flower
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Sacrifice Ravita Flower: Target Conjuror gains 2 Mugic counters.

name: Raznus, Assimilated
effect: 1MC: Danians you control may not be the target of Mugic or abilities. This ability can only be used once per turn.
Unique

name: Reactive Resolution
effect: Challenge Courage 15: Deal 5 damage.
Challenge Speed 15: Deal 5 damage.
If you win both challenges, deal 15 damage.

name: Reality Field Generator
effect: When equipped Creature enters a space with a Mirage Location, shuffle that Mirage Location into its owner's Location Deck.
Mirage Locations may not be placed in equipped Creature's space.

name: Reckless Defeat
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal damage equal to that Creature's Recklessness value.

name: Reckless Reproach
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal damage equal to that Creature's Recklessness value.

name: Rhyme of the Reckless
effect: When target attack deals damage, deal the same amount of damage to the Creature that played that attack.
The eyes show that which can be seen, but the ears reveal that which is real.

name: Rot Cloud
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has Air, deal 5 damage.
If the opposing engaged Creature has Earth, deal 5 damage.

name: Saand
effect: Invisibility: Surprise
Air 5
At the beginning of your turn, you may sacrifice Saand. If you do, each player removes a total of 3 Mugic counters from among any Creatures they control.
If Saand has any Mugic counters, sacrifice it.

name: Slashclaw
effect: If your engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal damage equal to twice its Recklessness value.

name: Song of Desperation
effect: Target engaged Creature gains 30 Energy. Checks and Challenges on Attacks that Creature plays deal no damage.
Unique

name: Song of the Dyad
effect: Choose one:
• Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
• Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
What brings happiness to one brings pain to another.

name: Strain of Ash
effect: Sacrifice a Battlegear equipped to an unengaged UnderWorld Creature you control. If you do, destroy target Battlegear.
Unique
As his Ice Cloak vanished, Bodal calculated he had 8.5 seconds until the firestorm immolated him.

name: Strain of Clarity
effect: Choose one:
• Shuffle target Mirage Location into its owner's Location Deck.
• If the active Location is a Mirage, shuffle it into its owner's Location deck and that player reveals a new active Location.
Unique

name: Strain of Expensive Delusions
effect: Destroy all Battlegear equipped to Creatures at target Mirage Location. Shuffle that Mirage Location into its owner's Location Deck.
Unique

name: Strain of Infection
effect: Uninfect up to three Infected Creatures. Target Danian Creature gains a Mugic counter for each Creature Uninfected Strain of Infection way.
Unique
Little parasites, big rewards.

name: Strain of the Tide
effect: Remove any number of OverWorld Creatures in your discard pile from the game. Heal 10 damage to target Creature for each card you remove this way.
Unique

name: Stupefying Tide
effect: Stat Fail Wisdom 50: Deal 10 damage.

name: Symmetry Slam
effect: Deal 5 damage for each Elemental Type shared by both engaged Creatures.

name: The Doomhammer
effect: Equipped Creature deals an additional 5 Attack damage to UnderWorld and Danian Creatures.
If equipped Creature is Danian, it has "Earth 5."
If equipped Creature is UnderWorld, it has an additional 50 Power.
Unique

name: The Hunter's Perimeter
effect: When The Hunter's Perimeter becomes the active Location, Mipedians gain "Invisibility: Surprise."
At the beginning of combat, reveal a new active Location.
Mirage: Creatures in this space cannot lose Invisibility. Invisibility abilities of Creatures in this space work against Creatures with Invisibility.

name: Titanix
effect: Intimidate: Courage 50
Intimidate: Speed 50
Recklessness 20
Loyal
"Sobtjek, admit that the rewards far outweigh the risks."

name: Trampling Tackle
effect: If your engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal 5 damage.

name: Tune of Xerium
effect: Sacrifice a Battlegear. If you do, return another Battlegear from your discard pile to play equipped to an unequipped Creature you control.
Unique

name: Twister of Elements
effect: Air, Water: Search your Attack Deck for up to three Attack Cards and put them in your Attack Discard pile, then shuffle your Attack Deck.

name: Uboraan
effect: Fireproof 10
Waterproof 10
Recklessness 15
Loyal
Uboraan is a smallish Warbeast... only about the size of twenty Chaors.

name: Viqtarr
effect: While Viqtarr has both higher Courage and Wisdom than the opposing engaged Creature, the first attack against it each combat deals 0 damage.

name: Void Dirge
effect: Remove up to three target cards in a player's general discard pile from the game.
Do not dwell on the past. What's lost is best forgotten.

name: Vyll
effect: 2MC: Remove a Mugic counter from target Creature.
As the "Annihilator of Mugic," Vyll prevents the casting of Mugic by targeting the source - the Mugicians themselves.

name: Warbeast Power Leash
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
If equipped Creature is a Warbeast, it has "Recklessness 5," has an additional 5 Energy for each Conjuror you control and deals an additional 5 damage with attacks.

name: Web Cocoon
effect: Stat Check Power 50: Your engaged Creature gains Fire.

name: Wind Whip
effect: If equipped Creature is Mipedian, it has Air.
If equipped Creature is a Conjuror, Warbeasts you control have "Recklessness 5."

name: Wytod
effect: Sacrifice Wytod: Choose a new target for target Mugic which only targets a single Creature.
Few Creatures have saved both Maxxor and Najarin's lives. None but Wytod have done so twice!

name: Xelfe
effect: 1MC: Target Creature gains "Range" and "Swift X," where X is the number of Mugic counters on Xelfe. (Check the number of Mugic counters when this ability resolves.)

name: Zapetur
effect: Sacrifice a Battlegear: Deal 5 damage to target Creature. This ability can only be used once per turn.
Sacrifice Zapetur: Destroy target Battlegear.
